GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v6.1.12
GSD.description:
ice: switch: fix potential memleak in ice_add_adv_recipe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.12 by commit 47f4ff6f23f00f5501ff2d7054c1a37c170a7aa0, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 8b032a55c1bd5d47527263445aba9dc45144b00d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ice: switch: fix potential memleak in ice_add_adv_recipe()
